Detailed Description

A line editor using the QCompleter CompleterDirModel to simplify the editing of the path. If the path is wrong, he's writing in red.

void DirectoryEdit::slotTextChanged ( QString  text  )  [protected, slot]

Slot called when the text changed. This method change the color of the text if the directory text not exist.
